title: Apple removing ad blockers that install root certificates from the App Store
text:
Apple removing ad blockers that install root certificates from the App Store 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Yesterday 
Apple this evening has removed a handful of apps from the App Store that install root certificates of their own. By installing their own roo...
